checkinhardware
func:
msg.headers = {}
const token = global.get('snipeit_token')
msg.headers['Accept'] = 'application/json'
msg.headers["Authorization"] = 'Bearer '+ token
msg.redirect = false
msg.token = token
console.log(msg.payload.assetId)
msg.id = msg.payload.assetId
msg.snipeit_host = global.get('snipeit_host')

 console.log(msg.id)
return msg;

name: Create current value registers and historical IOT data
info:
There is a frequent need store IOT data streams into
Cloudant database, and then interrogate the stored data.

A common use-case is to retrieve the 
"current value" of each attribute of interest - 
these values may not necessarily be present 
in the most recent data logged from the device.

This example shows how to store the most recent
attribute value in a document of its own, 
and generate a histoy trail for trending analysis, etc

name: registers
select register values
info:
often, devices will send subsets of sensor 
data at different frequencies - this stage
checks and captures particular values, if
available, in the incoming event

func:
msg.payload = msg.req.params.reg;
return msg;

name: details
Register API
info:
|URL| result |
|--|--|
|**/registers**|retrieve current values for all monitored sensor values |
|**/register/:reg**| retrieve 20 most recent values for specific register|
|**/register/:reg/detail**| display detail of original sensor event|

name: list
Names of WIOT sensor values to monitor
chart order
Devices
match checkoutlist to owntracks

func: return msg;

name: 20 most recent
history array
info:
array of most recent register values,
in descending order
